WRITING.TEXT: Indeed!
Had the exact same feeling.
An undead becomes a hollow when he looses a sense of purpose.
Gonna choose the Dark Lord ending in NG+.

WRITING.TITLE: The Nameless Song.
WRITING.TEXT: So I just beat the game for the first time. A very special experience has come to an end. The Nameless Song though. It's so wonderfully perfect to make you reminisce about the whole game. Absolutely brilliant. What was your experience when you first beat the game and heard the song for the first time?
Pyromancy wrecks them too. Ascend your pyro glove further and buy some spells from quelaana. It'll be a breeze with pyromancy and Solaire's help.
Done. Got her. Thanks for the guide. Praise the sun.
Done with the orbs but the bug in the center is annoying. Got there once attacked it. Nothing happened. But her chaos pillars hit me before I could attack once more.
Gonna try this .
Invade and drop items or get summoned and drop weapons.
And now it's my turn.

WRITING.TITLE: Help with bed of chaos.
WRITING.TEXT: Hey fellow undeads. On PC.. Tried cheesing Bed of bullshit with firebombs. Failed miserablly and out of firebombs now. Could someone help me out with the boss? It's my last lord soul. I am SL 95. Also it'll be great if I could summon 2 guys. One for the left orb and one for the right.
Knight Artorias for DS1. Fume Knight for DS2. Both favourites.
But if you check any other knight armor in Dark souls all have it on the left arm i.e the arm holding the shield. It's an everlasting debate though.
I'd argue that it's not his off hand because the shoulder plate is on his left arm which means that is the arm which he used for defense. So basically he was using his correct hand throughout.
This.
I try everyday to convince my friends to play the game. Also their excuse to not play is really stupid. "Bad graphics" apparently.
I too never felt frustrated. Instead had a smile everytime for I knew exactly why I got pancaked. A very well designed fight.

WRITING.TITLE: Do anybody still use the Battle Of Stoicism?

WRITING.TEXT: I can't wait for NG+ to fight him again.
That is exactly why I love it. Everything is a result of your actions. If you're too greedy he will wreck you.
Gotta attack when he powers up. Started getting close to beating him when i started that.

WRITING.TITLE: Just beat Sir Artorias for the first time..
WRITING.TEXT: What a truly magnificent fight. Went pure melee 1v1. All the aspects of the fight are amazing. Out of all the RPGs I've ever played i must say this fight has become my favorite and will always have a corner in my heart. And yes I like to call him Sir because for me he is a true legend. Wish I could erase my memory to relive that fight again.
I probably died around 40 times to them. Decided to just try and dodge all their attacks and attack only when I find a solid window. The fight lasted for about 20 minutes. So you'll get there.
Great. Best of luck beating Oreo Smores btw. Keep pushing.
Spare Siegmeyer please.
But why Solaire? Such a peaceful guy ready to help you whenever he can.
This mo-cap thing should be real.
Absolutely!
He's fast. Yes he was easy but it was a change in tone for me in terms of pace. That's why i found the boss actually cool. All the DLC bosses are amazing tbh though..
Also damn Sony who will most probably never release Bloodborne for PC.

WRITING.TITLE: Ever been so obsessed with Dark Souls that you play it even in your dreams?
WRITING.TEXT: I know i am obsessed.
Ohh he's a royal pain!
The entry to the DLC i.e. The Sanctuary Guardian itself is amazing. I really love that boss fight. we gotta be fast and our skills are really tested in the entirety of the DLC.
